trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia dane dla <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting"> </xref> zdarzenie <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Klasa ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs jest używana w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>metody.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because it is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs> class, the ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class provides access to input parameters for validation and manipulation through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ponieważ jest pochodną <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>klasy, klasy ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs zapewnia dostęp do danych wejściowych parametrów weryfikacji i manipulowania nimi za pomocą <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class also provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A> property, which is used to check whether the currently executing data retrieval operation is retrieving a row count, in addition to the data.
trans-unit.target: Klasa ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs udostępnia także <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>właściwość, która służy do sprawdzania, czy aktualnie wykonywane operacji pobierania danych pobiera liczba wierszy, oprócz danych.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is important because when data source paging is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event is raised twice.
trans-unit.target: Jest to ważne, ponieważ po włączeniu stronicowanie źródła danych, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>zdarzenie jest wywoływane dwa razy.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>Kontroli udostępnia wiele zdarzeń, które może obsłużyć do pracy z podstawowej obiektu biznesowego w różnym czasie w cyklu życia.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: W poniższej tabeli wymieniono zdarzenia i skojarzone <xref:System.EventArgs>klasy i delegaci programu obsługi zdarzeń.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|`EventArgs`|`EventHandler`| |-----------|-----------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Zdarzenia | `EventArgs`|`EventHandler`| |-----------|-----------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the business object is instantiated.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje bezpośrednio przed tworzenia wystąpienia klasy obiektu biznesowego. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the business object is instantiated.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje, natychmiast po utworzeniu wystąpienia obiektu biznesowych. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje przed pobraniem danych. | ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: Wystąpić przed insert, update lub operacja usuwania jest wykonywane. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje po pobraniu danych. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje po wstawieniu, zostało zakończone, operacji aktualizowania lub usuwania. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Występuje przed obiektu biznesowego. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: `inputParameters` Parametr jest <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>zbiór par nazw i wartości, które są zgodne z tymi w podpisie metody i są przekazywane przez odwołanie.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>z <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref> obiektów.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that specifies which additional data-related operations the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> should perform on a results set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> Określa, jakie dodatkowe operacje związane z danymi <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> należy wykonać w zestawie wyników, takich jak sortowania danych lub zwracanie konkretnego podzestawu danych.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> is retrieving the number of rows of data, in addition to the data itself; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Aby wskazać <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> jest pobierania liczby wierszy danych, a także dane; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object can use to request data-related operations when data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia mechanizm, który <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> obiektu służy do żądania operacji związanych z danymi, gdy dane są pobierane.

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object perform additional data-related operations on a results set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: Formanty powiązane z danymi użycia <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>klasy, aby zażądać <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>obiektu wykonania dodatkowych czynności związanych z danymi w zestawie wyników, takich jak sortowania danych lub zwracanie konkretnego podzestawu danych.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Te operacje związane z danych są wyliczane przez <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>wyliczenie.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: The Arguments property is read-only, so you can examine, but not change, the arguments that are passed by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Arguments — właściwość jest tylko do odczytu, więc można zbadać, ale nie jest to zmienić, argumenty, które są przekazywane przez formant powiązany z danymi.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that specifies which additional data-related operations the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> should perform on a results set.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> Określa, jakie dodatkowe operacje związane z danymi <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> należy wykonać w zestawie wyników.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> is retrieving a row count during a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą czy <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> podczas operacji pobierania danych podczas pobierania liczby wierszy.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object is performing data retrieval and data source paging is enabled, the data retrieval method is called twice: - Once to retrieve the set of data.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>obiekt wykonuje pobierania danych i jest włączone stronicowanie źródła danych, dwukrotnie wywoływana jest metoda pobierania danych:-raz, aby pobrać zestaw danych.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: - Once to retrieve a total row count.
trans-unit.target: -Raz, aby pobrać całkowitej liczby wierszy.

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event twice.
trans-unit.target: Uruchamia to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>dwukrotnie zdarzenie.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: For code that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event, it might be important to determine the nature of the event (retrieving data or retrieving row count) so that any additional work that is performed by the handler is not unnecessarily duplicated for every data retrieval operation that is performed.
trans-unit.target: Kod, który obsługuje <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>zdarzeń, może być ważne ustalić naturę zdarzenia (Pobieranie danych lub podczas pobierania liczby wierszy), tak aby żadnych dodatkowych działań, które jest wykonywane przez program obsługi nie jest niepotrzebnie zduplikowany dla każdej operacji pobierania danych, które jest przeprowadzane.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if data source paging is enabled and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> is retrieving a row count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, jeśli jest włączone stronicowanie źródła danych i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> pobiera liczba wierszy; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
